name: Kasuga / Sengoku Basara: Samurai Kings
description:
• Trigger：kasuga

  • V2-Default Outfit： brown eyes, blonde hair, short hair with long locks, open bodysuit, fishnets, gloves, brelet, high heels

  • V1-Default Outfit： brown eyes, blonde hair, long hair, short hair with long locks, open bodysuit, fishnets, gloves, bracelet, high heels

  • weight：0.9~1.0（0.9 is recommended, Weight varies from model to model, so try different weights.）

  • Since the character has distinctive hair, it sometimes does not render well. Output a lot to get good results.

  • If you want to draw a back view, put "backless outfit" in the prompt.

  • If you put in "high heels", you will see more fullbody, if you prefer cowboy shot, remove it.

  • model：[revAnimated_v122], [dreamcomestrue_dctv13Fp32NoEma]

  • Please support me to produce continuously. buymeacoffee
